name: frontend
description: An Electron app that starts a Go binary using IPC

scripts.build: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../overlay-darwin-arm64 ../.. && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../overlay-darwin-amd64 ../.. && GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../overlay-linux-arm64 ../.. && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../overlay-linux-amd64 ../..

author: Cedric Vanhaverbeke
